verses.name: Ezekiel 20:18
verses.text: But I said unto their children in the wilderness, Walk ye not in the statutes of your fathers, neither observe their judgments, nor defile yourselves with their idols:

verses.name: Ezekiel 20:19
verses.text: I am the Lord your God; walk in my statutes, and keep my judgments, and do them;

verses.name: Ezekiel 20:20
verses.text: And hallow my sabbaths; and they shall be a sign between me and you, that ye may know that I am the Lord your God.
